[She]3921-her stood before [the shrine]1134-the shrine . [The Madonna]435-the madonna looked gravely upon [her]3921-her . [The holy Babe]606-the holy babe gazed with omniscient eyes , holding forth tiny hands of omnipotence .

Even so had [they]3973-they looked in [her]144-mora hour of joy , when [she]144-mora had kneeled in a transport of thanksgiving .

Even so had [they]3973-they looked in [her]144-mora hour of anguish , when [she]144-mora had poured out [her]144-mora despair at having been twice deceived .

Yet help had not come , until [she]3921-her had lifted [her]3921-her eyes unto [the hills]3974-the hills .

[She]3921-her turned from [the shrine]1134-the shrine , went swiftly to the open casement , and stood looking over the green tree tops , to [the heavenly blue beyond]3976-the heavenly blue beyond , flecked by swift moving clouds .

[She]3921-her , who had now learned to " look . . . at the things that are not seen , "[3921-her] could not find help through gazing on carven images .

Thoughts of [[our]3977-our Lady]4260-our lady seemed more living and vital while [she]3921-her kept [her]3921-her eyes upon the fleecy whiteness of those tiny clouds , or watched a flight of mountain birds , silver - winged in the sunshine .

What was the one command recorded as having been given , by [the blessed Mother of [[our]3977-our Lord]4256-our lord]5067-the blessed mother of our lord , to [men]4397-men ? " Whatsoever [He]4256-our lord saith unto [you]144-mora , do it . "[5067-the blessed mother of our lord] And what was [His]4256-our lord last injunction to [[His]4256-our lord Church on [earth]4391-earth]3982-his church on earth ? " Go [ye]144-mora into [all the world]7078-all the world and preach glad tidings to [every creature]7079-every creature . . . . And lo , [I]144-mora am with [you]144-mora always . "[144-mora] [Mora]144-mora could not but know that [she]144-mora had come forth into [[her]144-mora world]3984-her world bringing the glad tidings of love requited , of comfort , and of [home]305-home .

By virtue of this promise the feet of [the risen Christ]3986-the risen christ would move beside [her]144-mora " all the days . "[3986-the risen christ]

It seemed to [her]144-mora , that if [she]144-mora went back now into [[her]144-mora Convent cell]3987-her convent cell , [she]144-mora would nail those blessed feet to the wood again . In slaying this new life within [herself]144-mora , [she]144-mora would lose forever the sense of living companionship , retaining only the religion of the Crucifix . Enough , perhaps , for the cloistered life . But this life more abundant , demanded that grace should yet more abound .

A great apostolic injunction sounded , like a clarion call , from the stored chancel of [her]144-mora memory . " As [ye]7080-ye have therefore received [Christ Jesus the Lord]256-christ jesus the lord , so walk [ye]7080-ye in [Him]256-christ jesus the lord . "[144-mora]

[She]144-mora flung wide [her]144-mora arms . A sense of all - pervading liberty , a complete freedom from all bondage of spirit , soul , or body , leapt up responsive to the call .

" [I]144-mora will ! "[144-mora] [she]144-mora said . " Without any further fear or faltering , [I]144-mora will ! "[144-mora]

[She]144-mora passed to the couch , folded the robes [she]144-mora had worn so long , and laid them away in an empty chest .

This done , [she]144-mora took [her]144-mora cross of office , and went down to [the terrace]3259-the terrace . [Her]144-mora one thought was to reach [Hugh]132-hugh with as little delay as possible . [She]144-mora could not leave that noble heart in suspense , a moment longer than [she]144-mora need . The sun was still high in the heavens . By the short way through [the woods]5596-the woods , [she]144-mora could reach [the castle]5855-the castle long before sunset .

[She]144-mora owed [Hugh]132-hugh much . Yet there was another to whom [she]144-mora also owed a debt ; how much [she]144-mora owed to [him]132-hugh , this day 's new light had shewn [her]144-mora . [She]144-mora would go forward to [her]144-mora joy with a freer heart if [she]144-mora gave [herself]144-mora time to discharge , by acknowledgment and thanks , the great debt [she]144-mora owed to [[her]144-mora old and faithful friend]3991-her old and faithful friend , [Symon]154-symon of worcester , [Bishop of [Worcester]1-worcester]1222-bishop of worcester .

[She]144-mora sent for [[her]144-mora steward]3993-her steward .

" [Zachary]231-zachary , "[144-mora] [she]144-mora said , " [Sir Hugh]132-hugh has ridden on before . [I]144-mora follow by the short way through [the forest]6518-the forest , and shall not return to - night . Bid [them]7082-they saddle [my]144-mora white palfrey , [Icon]174-icon . [I]144-mora shall be ready to start within an hour . But first [I]144-mora must despatch to [Worcester]1-worcester , a packet of importance . Bid [two of [the men]5269-the men , who rode with [us]7085-us from [Worcester]1-worcester]7083-two of the men , who rode with us from worcester , prepare to mount and return thither . If [they]7082-they start in an hour 's time , [they]7082-they can be well on [their]7082-they way , and make [a safe lodging]7086-a safe lodging , before nightfall . "[144-mora]

[She]144-mora passed into [the library]2268-the library , laid the cross before [her]144-mora on the table , and began [her]144-mora letter to [the Bishop]4673-the bishop .

Straight from [her]144-mora hand to [his]4673-the bishop , that letter went ; straight from [her]144-mora heart to [his]4673-the bishop , that letter spoke ; and [Symon]154-symon of worcester 's comfort in it , lies largely in the knowledge that [she]144-mora was alone when [she]144-mora wrote it , alone when [she]144-mora sealed it , and that none in [this world]2723-this world , saving [[they]3997-they two]3998-they two , will ever know exactly what [the woman , whom [he]4673-the bishop had loved so purely and served so faithfully]3999-the woman , whom he had loved so purely and served so faithfully , said to [him]4673-the bishop in this letter .

Bare facts , however , may be given .

[She]144-mora told [him]4673-the bishop , as briefly as might be , of that morning 's great experience ; of [Hugh]132-hugh 's return , and noble self - effacement ; of the clear light [she]144-mora had received , and the decision to which [she]144-mora had come ; and of how [she]144-mora was now going forward , with a free heart , to [her]144-mora great happiness .

And then , in glowing words , [she]144-mora told [him]4673-the bishop all [she]144-mora owed to [his]4673-the bishop faithful , patient friendship , to the teaching of long years , the trend of which had always been life , light , liberty ; a wider outlook , a fearless judgment , a clear knowledge of [God]89-god , based on inspired writings ; and , above all , belief in those words , often on [his]4673-the bishop lips , always in [his]4673-the bishop heart : " Love never faileth . "[144-mora]

" Truly , [[my]144-mora dear lord]5116-my dear lord , "[144-mora] [she]144-mora wrote , " [your]4673-the bishop love "[144-mora] Nay , it may not be quoted !

[She]144-mora told [him]4673-the bishop how [his]4673-the bishop teaching , following along the same lines as that of [Father Gervaise]185-father gervaise years before , had prepared [her]144-mora mind for this revelation of [the ever - living Saviour]4000-the ever - living saviour .

" Now the mystery is unveiled to [me]144-mora also , "[144-mora] [she]144-mora wrote , " [I]144-mora realise that [you]4673-the bishop knew it all along ; and that , had [I]144-mora but been more teachable , [Reverend Father]155-reverend father , [you]4673-the bishop could have taught [me]144-mora more . Oh , [I]144-mora pray [you]4673-the bishop , take heart of grace , and teach these great truths to [others]482-others . "[144-mora]

[She]144-mora blessed [him]4673-the bishop for [his]4673-the bishop faithfulness in striving to make [her]144-mora see [her]144-mora duty to [Hugh]132-hugh , and [her]144-mora life 's true vocation .

[She]144-mora blessed [him]4673-the bishop for [her]144-mora great happiness , yet thanked [him]4673-the bishop for [his]4673-the bishop care in sending [her]144-mora cross of office , thus making all easy in order that , had [her]144-mora conscience so required , [she]144-mora could have safely returned . [She]144-mora herewith sent [him]4673-the bishop the cross , and begged that [he]4673-the bishop would keep it , remembering when [he]4673-the bishop chanced to look upon it

[She]144-mora also begged [him]4673-the bishop to forgive [her]144-mora the many times when [she]144-mora had tried [his]4673-the bishop patience , and been [herself]144-mora impatient of [his]4673-the bishop wise counsel and control .

And , finally , [she]144-mora signed [herself]144-mora

Mora held the cross to [her]144-mora lips , then placed it within the letter , folded the packet , sealed it with [her]144-mora own seal , addressed it with full directions , and called for [the messenger]4548-the messenger .

Thus , fully four days before [he]4673-the bishop had looked to have it , the answer for which [he]4673-the bishop waited , reached [the Bishop]4673-the bishop 's hand . As [he]4673-the bishop opened it , and perceived the gleam of gold and emeralds , [he]4673-the bishop glanced across to the deed chest , where lay [the Knight]764-the knight 's white stone .

The rose beside it had not yet faded . It might have been plucked and placed in the water that morning , so fair it bloomed a red , red rose . Ah , [Verity]247-verity ! [Little Angel Child]257-little angel child !

It was said in sunny [Florence]202-florence in the years that followed , and , later on , it was remarked in [Rome]37-rome , that if [the Lord High Cardinal kindest of men]4004-the lord high cardinal kindest of men was tried almost beyond bearing , if even [his]4673-the bishop calm patience seemed in danger of ruffling , or if [he]4673-the bishop was weary , or sad , or disheartened , [he]4673-the bishop had a way of slipping [his]4673-the bishop hand into the bosom of [his]4673-the bishop scarlet robe , as if [he]4673-the bishop gently fingered something that lay against [his]4673-the bishop heart .

[Whereupon]144-mora at , once [his]4673-the bishop brow grew serene again , [his]4673-the bishop blue eyes kindly and bright , [his]4673-the bishop lips smiled that patient smile which never failed ; and , as [he]4673-the bishop drew forth [his]4673-the bishop hand , the stone within [his]4673-the bishop ring , though pale before , glowed deep red , as juice of purple grapes in a goblet .

CHAPTER LVII

" [I]144-mora CHOOSE TO RIDE ALONE "[144-mora]

[Mora]144-mora escaped from the restraining arms of [old Debbie]209-mistress deborah , and appeared at the top of the steps leading down to [the courtyard]775-the courtyard .

Framed in the doorway , in [her]144-mora green riding dress , [she]144-mora stood for a moment , surveying the scene before [her]144-mora .

[The two men bound for [Worcester]1-worcester]4006-the two men bound for worcester , bearing [her]144-mora packet to [the Bishop]4673-the bishop , had just ridden out at the great gates . Through the gates , still standing open , [she]144-mora could see [them]4006-the two men bound for worcester guiding [their]4006-the two men bound for worcester horses down [the hill]1925-the hill and taking [the southward road]4009-the southward road .

[The porter]3317-the porter was attempting to close the gates , but [a stable lad]4011-a stable lad hindered [him]3317-the porter , pointing to [Icon]174-icon , whom [a groom]4012-a groom was leading , ready saddled , to and fro , before the door ; [Icon]174-icon , with proudly arched neck and swishing tail , as conscious of [his]174-icon snowy beauty as when , in [the river meadow]5045-the river meadow at [Worcester]1-worcester , [he]174-icon found [himself]174-icon the centre of [an admiring crowd of nuns]4014-an admiring crowd of nuns .

At sight of [his]174-icon flowing mane , powerful forequarters , and high stepping action , [Mora]144-mora was irresistibly reminded of the scene in [the courtyard]775-the courtyard at [the Nunnery]397-the nunnery , when [the Bishop]4673-the bishop rode in on [his]4673-the bishop favourite white palfrey , [she]144-mora standing at the top of the steps to receive [him]4673-the bishop . Never again would [she]144-mora stand so , to receive [the Bishop]4673-the bishop ; never again would [Icon]174-icon proudly carry [him]4673-the bishop . [The Bishop]4673-the bishop had given [her]144-mora to [Hugh]132-hugh and [Icon]174-icon to [her]144-mora . A faint sense of compunction stirred within [her]144-mora . Perhaps at that moment [she]144-mora came near to realising something of what both gifts had cost [the Bishop]4673-the bishop .

Bending [her]144-mora head , [she]144-mora looked across [the courtyard]775-the courtyard and under the gateway . [The messengers]4022-the messengers were riding fast . Even as [she]144-mora looked , [they]4022-the messengers disappeared into [the pine wood]4023-the pine wood .

[Her]144-mora letter to [Symon]154-symon of worcester was well on its way . [She]144-mora remembered with comfort and gladness certain things [she]144-mora had written in that letter .

Then as the pine wood swallowed [the messengers]4022-the messengers with a joyous bound of reaction [her]144-mora whole mind turned to [Hugh]132-hugh .

Three steps below [her]144-mora , [a page]4025-a page waited , holding a dagger which [she]144-mora had been wo nt to wear , when riding in [the forests]4422-the forests . [She]144-mora had sent it out to be sharpened . [She]144-mora took it from [him]132-hugh , tested its point , slipped it into the sheath at [her]144-mora belt , smiled upon [the boy]4027-the boy , descended the remaining steps , and laid [her]144-mora hand upon [Icon]174-icon 's mane .

Then it was that [Mistress Deborah]209-mistress deborah 's agitated signals from within the doorway , took effect upon [old Zachary]231-zachary .

Coming forward , [he]132-hugh bared [his]132-hugh white head , and adventured a humble expostulation .

" [[My]132-hugh lady]7089-my lady , "[132-hugh] [he]132-hugh said , " it is not safe nor well that [you]144-mora should ride alone . A few moments ' delay will suffice [Beaumont]232-beaumont to saddle a horse and be ready to attend [you]144-mora . "[132-hugh]

[She]144-mora mounted before [she]144-mora made answer .

[She]144-mora kept [her]144-mora imperious temper well in hand , striving to remember that to [old Debbie]209-mistress deborah and [Zachary]231-zachary [she]144-mora seemed but [the child [they]4029-they had loved and watched over from infancy]4028-the child they had loved and watched over from infancy , of a sudden grown older . [They]4029-they had not known [the Prioress of [the White Ladies]288-the white ladies]1156-the prioress of the white ladies .

Bending from the saddle , [her]144-mora hand on [Icon]174-icon 's mane :

" [I]144-mora go to [[my]144-mora husband]6683-my husband , [Zachary]231-zachary , "[144-mora] [she]144-mora said , " and [I]144-mora choose to ride alone . "[144-mora]

Then gathering up the reins , [she]144-mora turned [Icon]174-icon toward the gates and so rode across [the courtyard]775-the courtyard , looking , neither back to where [Mistress Deborah]209-mistress deborah alternately wrung [her]209-mistress deborah hands and shook [her]209-mistress deborah fist at [Zachary]231-zachary ; nor to right or left , where [Mark]206-mary mark and [Beaumont]232-beaumont , standing with doffed caps waited till [she]144-mora should have passed , to yield to the full enjoyment of [Mistress Deborah]209-mistress deborah 's gestures , and of [Master Zachary]231-zachary 's discomfiture .

[She]144-mora rode forth looking straight before [her]144-mora , over the pointed ears of [Icon]174-icon . [She]144-mora was riding to [Hugh]132-hugh , and , [[they]4033-they who stood by]4034-they who stood by must not see the love - light in [her]144-mora eyes .

Grave and serene , [her]144-mora head held high , [she]144-mora paced the white palfrey through the gates . And if [the porter]3317-the porter marked a wondrous shining in [her]144-mora eyes well , the sun began to slant its rays , and [she]144-mora rode straight toward the west .

[Zachary]231-zachary mounted the steps and hastened across [the hall]1551-the hall , followed by [Deborah]209-mistress deborah . [Mark]206-mary mark thereupon enacted [Mistress Deborah]209-mistress deborah , and [Beaumont]232-beaumont , [Master Zachary]231-zachary ; while [the page]4037-the page sat down on the steps to laugh .

[The porter]3317-the porter clanged to the gates .

The day 's work was done .

CHAPTER LVIII

[THE WARRIOR HEART]4039-the warrior heart

As [Mora]144-mora turned off [the highway]4040-the highway , and pressed [Icon]174-icon deep into the glades , [she]144-mora cried over and over aloud , for there was none to hear : " [I]144-mora go to [[my]144-mora husband]6683-my husband , and [I]144-mora choose to ride alone . "[144-mora]

How wondrous it seemed , this going to [him]231-zachary ; a second giving , a deeper surrender , a fuller yielding .

When [she]144-mora went to [him]231-zachary in [the crypt]273-the crypt , [her]144-mora body had recoiled , [her]144-mora spirit had shrunk , shamed , humbled , and unwilling . [Her]144-mora mind alone , governed by [her]144-mora will , had driven [her]144-mora along the path of [her]144-mora resolve , holding [her]144-mora upon the stretcher , until too late to cry out or to return .

Now how different ! Free as air , alone , uncoerced , even unexpected , [she]144-mora left [[her]144-mora own home]4042-her own home , and [[her]144-mora own people]5858-her own people , to ride , unattended , straight to the arms of [the man who had won [her]144-mora]4044-the man who had won her .

A wild joy seized and shook [her]144-mora .

[The soft , mysterious glades]4045-the soft , mysterious glades , beneath vast , leafy domes , seemed enchanted ground . The hoofs of [Icon]174-icon thudded softly on the moss . The stillness seemed alive with whispering life . Rabbits sat still to peep , then whisked and ran . Great birds rose suddenly , on whirring wings . Tiny birds , fearless , stayed on their twigs and sang .

There was scurrying among ferns and rocks , telling of bright , watchful eyes ; of life , safeguarding itself , unseen . Yet all these varied sounds , Nature disturbed in the shady haunts which were [[her]144-mora rightful home]4046-her rightful home , did but emphasize the vast stillness , the utter solitude , the complete remoteness from human dwelling - place .

Shining through parted boughs and slowly moving leaves , the sunlight fell , in golden bars or shifting yellow patches , on [the glade]4047-the glade .

The joy which thrilled [[his]4044-the man who had won her rider]4048-his rider , seemed to communicate itself to [Icon]174-icon . [He]4044-the man who had won her galloped over the moss on the broad rides , and would scarce be restrained when passing between great rocks , or turning sharply into an unseen way .

[Mora]144-mora rode as in a dream . " [I]144-mora ride to [[my]144-mora husband]6683-my husband , "[144-mora] [she]144-mora cried to [the forest]6518-the forest , " and [I]144-mora choose to ride alone ! "[144-mora] And once [she]144-mora sang , in an irrepressible burst of praise : " Jesu dulsis memoria ! "[144-mora] Then , when [she]144-mora fell silent : " Dulsis ! Dulsis ! "[144-mora] carolled unseen choristers in leafy clerestories overhead . And each time [Icon]174-icon heard [her]144-mora voice , [he]174-icon laid back [his]174-icon ears and cantered faster .

Not far from [her]144-mora journey 's end , the way lay through [a deep gorge in the very heart of [the pine wood]4023-the pine wood]4050-a deep gorge in the very heart of the pine wood .

Here the sun 's rays could scarce penetrate ; [the path]4052-the path became rough and slippery ; [a hidden stream]4053-a hidden stream oozed up between loose stones .

[Icon]174-icon picked [his]174-icon way , with care ; yet even so , [he]174-icon slipped , recovered , and slipped again .

With a sudden rush , some wild animal , huge and heavy , went crashing through the undergrowth .

Stealthy footsteps seemed to keep pace with [Icon]174-icon 's , high up among the tree trunks .

Yet [this valley of the shadow]4054-this valley of the shadow held no terrors for [the woman whose heart was now so blissfully at rest]4055-the woman whose heart was now so blissfully at rest .

Having left behind forever the dark vale of doubt and indecision , [she]144-mora mounted [triumphant on the wings of trust and certainty]4056-triumphant on the wings of trust and certainty .

" [I]144-mora ride to [[my]144-mora husband]6683-my husband , "[144-mora] [she]144-mora whispered , as if the words were a charm which might bring the sense of [his]174-icon strong arms about [her]144-mora , " and [I]144-mora choose to ride alone . "[144-mora]

With a gentle caress on the arch of [his]174-icon snowy neck , and with soft words in the anxiously pointing ears , [she]144-mora encouraged [the palfrey]5274-the palfrey to go forward .

At length [they]4058-they rounded a great grey rock jutting out into [the path]4052-the path , and the upward slope of [a mossy glade]4060-a mossy glade came into view .

With a whinny of pleasure , [Icon]174-icon laid back [his]174-icon ears and broke into a swift canter .

Up [the glade]4047-the glade [they]4058-they flew ; out into the sunshine ; clear into the open .

Here was [the moor]4062-the moor ! Here the highroad , at last ! And there in the distance , the grey walls of [[Hugh]132-hugh 's castle]4063-hugh 's castle ; [the portals of [home]305-home]4064-the portals of home .

It was [[the Knight]764-the knight 's trusted foster - brother]4067-the knight 's trusted foster - brother , [Martin Goodfellow]133-martin , amazed , yet smiling a glad welcome , who held [Icon]174-icon 's bridle as [Mora]144-mora dismounted in [the courtyard]775-the courtyard .

[She]144-mora fondled [the palfrey]5274-the palfrey 's nose , laying [her]144-mora cheek against [his]5274-the palfrey neck . For the moment it became imperative that [she]144-mora should hide [her]144-mora happy eyes even from [this faithful fellow , in whom [she]144-mora had learned to place entire confidence]4070-this faithful fellow , in whom she had learned to place entire confidence .

" [Icon]174-icon , brave and beautiful ! "[144-mora] [she]144-mora whispered . " [Thou]7094-thou hast carried [me]144-mora here where [I]144-mora longed to be . [Thy]7094-thou feet were well - nigh as swift as [my]144-mora desire . "[144-mora]

Then [she]144-mora turned , speaking quickly and low .

" [Martin]133-martin , where is [[my]144-mora husband]6683-my husband ? Where shall [I]144-mora find [Sir Hugh]132-hugh ? "[144-mora]

" [[My]133-martin lady]7089-my lady , "[133-martin] said [Martin]133-martin , " [I]133-martin saw [him]6683-my husband last in [the armoury]4627-the armoury . "[133-martin]

" [The armoury]4627-the armoury ? "[144-mora] [she]144-mora questioned .

" [A chamber opening out of [the great hall]1672-the great hall , facing toward the west , with steps leading down into [the garden]358-the garden]7099-a chamber opening out of the great hall , facing toward the west , with steps leading down into the garden . "[144-mora]

" Even as [[my]144-mora chamber]5279-my chamber ? "[144-mora]

" The armoury door faces the door of [[your]144-mora chamber]7103-your chamber , [Countess]258-countess . The width of [the hall]1551-the hall lies between . "[144-mora]

" Can [I]144-mora reach [[my]144-mora chamber]5279-my chamber without entering [the hall]1551-the hall , or passing the armoury windows ? [I]144-mora would rid [me]144-mora of [my]144-mora travel - stains , before [I]144-mora make [my]144-mora presence known to [Sir Hugh]132-hugh . "[144-mora]

" Pass round to the right , and through [the buttery]7107-the buttery ; then [you]144-mora reach [the garden]358-the garden and the steps up to [[your]144-mora chamber]7103-your chamber from the side beyond [the armoury]4627-the armoury . "[144-mora]

" Good . Tell [no one]7111-no one of [my]144-mora presence , [Martin]133-martin . [I]144-mora have here the key of [[my]144-mora chamber]5279-my chamber . Has [Sir Hugh]132-hugh asked for it ? "[144-mora]

" Nay , [[my]144-mora lady]7089-my lady ; nor guessed how often [we]7114-we rode hither . [We]7114-we reached [the castle]5855-the castle scarce two hours ago . [The Knight]764-the knight bathed , and changed [his]764-the knight dusty garments ; then dined alone . After which [he]764-the knight went into [the armoury]4627-the armoury . "[144-mora]

" When did [you]133-martin see [him]764-the knight last , [Martin]133-martin ? "[144-mora]

" Two minutes ago , [lady]5126-lady . [I]144-mora come this moment from [the hall]1551-the hall . "[144-mora]

" What was [he]764-the knight doing , [Martin]133-martin ? "[144-mora]

[Martin Goodfellow]133-martin hesitated . [He]133-martin knew something of love , and as much as [an honest man]4071-an honest man may know , of [women]4202-women . [He]133-martin shrewdly suspicioned what [she]4073-she would expect [the Knight]764-the knight to be doing . [He]133-martin was sorely tempted to give a fancy picture of [Sir Hugh]132-hugh d'Argent , in [his]132-hugh lovelorn loneliness .

[He]133-martin looked into the clear eyes bent upon [him]133-martin ; glanced at the firm hand , arrested for a moment in its caress of [Icon]174-icon 's neck ; then decided that , though the truth might probably be unexpected , a lie would most certainly be unwise .

" Truth to tell , "[133-martin] said [Martin Goodfellow]133-martin , " [Sir Hugh]132-hugh was testing [his]132-hugh armour , and sharpening [his]132-hugh battle - axe . "[133-martin]

As [Mora]144-mora passed into the dim coolness of [the buttery]7107-the buttery , [she]144-mora was conscious of a very definite sense of surprise . [She]144-mora had pictured [Hugh]132-hugh in [[his]132-hugh lonely home]4076-his lonely home , nursing [his]132-hugh hungry heart , beside [[his]132-hugh desolate hearth]4077-his desolate hearth . [She]144-mora had seen [herself]144-mora coming softly behind [him]132-hugh , laying a tender hand upon those bowed shoulders ; then , as [he]132-hugh lifted eyes in which dull despair would quickly give place to wondering joy , saying : " [Hugh]132-hugh , [I]132-hugh am come [home]305-home . "[132-hugh]

But now , as [she]144-mora passed through [the buttery]7107-the buttery , [Mora]144-mora had to realise that yet again [she]144-mora had failed to understand [the man [she]144-mora loved]4079-the man she loved .

It was not in [him]132-hugh , to sit and brood over lost happiness . If [she]144-mora failed [him]132-hugh finally , [he]132-hugh was ready in this , as in all else , to play [the man]4228-the man , going straight on , unhindered by vain regret .

Once again [her]144-mora pride in [him]132-hugh , in that [he]132-hugh was finer than [her]144-mora own conceptions , quickened [her]144-mora love , even while it humbled [her]144-mora , in [her]144-mora own estimation , to a place at [his]132-hugh feet .

A glory of joy was on [her]144-mora face as , making [her]144-mora way through to [the terrace]3259-the terrace , now bathed in sunset light , [she]144-mora passed up to [the chamber [she]144-mora had prepared during [Hugh]132-hugh 's absence]4082-the chamber she had prepared during hugh 's absence .

All was as [she]144-mora had left [it]4082-the chamber she had prepared during hugh 's absence .

Fastening the door by which [she]144-mora had entered from [the garden]358-the garden , [she]144-mora noiselessly opened that which gave on to [the great hall]1672-the great hall .

[The hall]1551-the hall was dark and deserted , but the door into [the armoury]4627-the armoury stood ajar .

A shaft of golden sunshine streamed through the half - open door .

[She]144-mora heard the clang of armour . [She]144-mora could not see [Hugh]132-hugh , but even as [she]144-mora stood in [her]144-mora own doorway , looking across [the hall]1551-the hall , [she]144-mora heard [his]132-hugh voice , singing , as [he]132-hugh worked , snatches of the latest song of [Blondel]259-blondel , [[the King]4555-the king 's Minstrel]4089-the king 's minstrel .

With beating heart , [Mora]144-mora turned and closed [her]144-mora door , making it fast within .

CHAPTER LIX

THE MADONNA IN [THE HOME

[Hugh]132-hugh d'Argent]4090-the home hugh d'argent had polished [his]132-hugh armour , put a keen edge on [his]132-hugh battle - axe , and rubbed the rust from [his]132-hugh swords .

The torment of suspense , the sickening pain of hope deferred , could be better borne , while [he]132-hugh turned [his]132-hugh mind on future battles , and [his]132-hugh muscles to vigorous action .

Of the way in which the cup of perfect bliss had been snatched from [his]132-hugh very lips , [he]132-hugh could not trust [himself]132-hugh to think .

[His]4091-his was the instinct of [the fighter]4092-the fighter , to bend [his]132-hugh whole mind upon the present , preparing for the future ; not wasting energy in useless reconsideration of an accomplished past .

[He]132-hugh had acted as [he]132-hugh had felt bound in honour to act . Gain or loss to [himself]132-hugh had not been the point at issue . Even as , in the hot fights with [the Saracens]134-the saracens , slaying or being slain might incidentally result from the action of the moment , but the possession of the Holy Sepulchre was the true object for which [each warrior who had taken the cross]4093-each warrior who had taken the cross , drew [his]4093-each warrior who had taken the cross sword or swung [his]4093-each warrior who had taken the cross battle - axe .

Was honour , held unsullied , to prove in this case , the tomb of [his]132-hugh life 's happiness ? Three days of suspense , during which [Mora]144-mora considered , and [he]132-hugh and [the Bishop]4673-the bishop waited . On the third day , would [Love]122-love arise victorious , purified by suffering , clad in raiment of dazzling whiteness ? Would there be [Easter]260-easter in [his]132-hugh heart , and deep peace in [[his]132-hugh home]5182-his home ? Or would [[his]132-hugh beloved]4096-his beloved wind [herself]4096-his beloved once more in cerements , would the seal of [the Vatican]5450-the vatican be set upon the stone of monastic rules and regulations , making it fast , secure , inviolable ? Would [he]132-hugh , turning sadly from the Zion of hopes fulfilled , be walking in dull despair to the Emmaus of [an empty home]4098-an empty home , of a day far spent , holding no promise of a brighter dawn ?

But , even as [his]132-hugh mind dwelt on the symbolism of that sacred scene , [the Knight]764-the knight remembered that [the two who walked in sadness]4100-the two who walked in sadness did not long walk alone . [One , stepping silently]4101-one , stepping silently , came up with [them]4100-the two who walked in sadness ; knowing all , yet asking tenderest question ; [the Master]4102-the master , Whom [they]4100-the two who walked in sadness mourned , [Himself]4102-the master drew near and went with [them]4100-the two who walked in sadness .

It seemed to [Hugh]132-hugh d'Argent that if so real a Presence as that , could draw near to [him]132-hugh and to [Mora]144-mora at this sad parting of the ways , if [their]4100-the two who walked in sadness religion did but hold a thing so vital , then might [they]4100-the two who walked in sadness have a true vision of Life , which should make clear the reason for the long years of suffering , and point the way to the glory which should follow . Then , being blessed , not merely by [the Church]4592-the church and [the Bishop]4673-the bishop but by [the Christ]492-the christ [Himself]492-the christ [He]132-hugh Who at [Cana]7-cana granted the best wine when the earthly vintage failed the wedding feast [they]4100-the two who walked in sadness might leave behind forever [the empty tomb of hopes frustrated]4106-the empty tomb of hopes frustrated , and return together , with exceeding joy , to the Jerusalem of joys fulfilled .

[Hugh]132-hugh laid down [his]132-hugh sword , rose , stretched [himself]132-hugh , and stood looking full into the golden sunset .

[He]132-hugh could not account for it , but somehow the darkness had lifted . The sense of loneliness was gone . An Unseen Presence seemed with [him]132-hugh . The thought of prayer throbbed through [his]132-hugh helpless spirit , like the uplifting beat of strong white wings .

" O [God]89-god , "[132-hugh] [he]132-hugh said , " [Thou]7121-thee seemest to [me]132-hugh as [a stranger]3438-a stranger , when [I]132-hugh meet [Thee]7121-thee on [mine]132-hugh own life 's way . [I]132-hugh know [Thee]7121-thee as [Babe divine]147-the holy babe ; [I]132-hugh know [Thee]7121-thee , crucified ; [I]132-hugh know [Thee]7121-thee risen , and ascending in such clouds of glory as hide [Thee]7121-thee from [mine]132-hugh earthbound sight . But , if [Thou]7121-thee hast drawn near along the rocky footpath of each day 's common happenings , then have [mine]132-hugh eyes indeed been holden , and [I]132-hugh knew [Thee]7121-thee not . "[132-hugh]

[Hugh]132-hugh stood motionless , [his]132-hugh eyes on the glory of the sunset battlements . And into [his]132-hugh mind there came , as clearly as if that moment uttered , the words of [Father Gervaise]185-father gervaise : " [He]185-father gervaise ever liveth to make intercession for [us]7123-us . "[185-father gervaise]

[The Knight]764-the knight raised [his]764-the knight right arm . " Oh , if [Thou]7121-thee livest , "[764-the knight] [he]764-the knight said , " and living , knowest ; and knowing , carest ; grant [me]764-the knight a sign of [Thy]7121-thee nearness a Vision of Life and of Love , which shall make clear this mist of uncertainty . "[764-the knight]

Turning back to [his]132-hugh work , so great a load seemed lifted from [his]132-hugh heart , that [he]132-hugh found [himself]132-hugh singing as [he]132-hugh put a keener edge on [his]132-hugh weapons .

Presently [he]132-hugh went over to the corner where stood the silver shield . Hitherto [he]132-hugh had kept [his]132-hugh eyes turned from it . It called up thoughts which [he]132-hugh had striven to beat back . Now , [he]132-hugh set to work and polished it until its surface shone clear as a mirror .

And as [he]132-hugh worked , [he]132-hugh thought within [himself]132-hugh : " What said [the Bishop]4673-the bishop ? That [I]132-hugh saw reflected in [my]132-hugh silver shield naught save [mine]132-hugh own proud face ? But [I]132-hugh told [[my]132-hugh wife]4532-my wife that [I]132-hugh see there the face of [God]89-god , or the nearest [I]132-hugh know to [His]89-god face ; and , behind [Him]89-god , [her]4532-my wife face the face of [[my]132-hugh beloved]4702-my beloved ; for , had [I]132-hugh not put reverence and honour first , [my]132-hugh very love for [her]4532-my wife would have been tarnished . "[132-hugh]

[Hugh]132-hugh stood the silver shield at such an angle as that it reflected the sunset , yet as [he]132-hugh kneeled upon one knee before it [he]132-hugh could not see [his]132-hugh own reflection .

The sun , round and blood red , almost dipping below the horizon , shone out in crimson glory from the deepest heart of the silver .

[Hugh]132-hugh remembered two verses of a Hebrew poem which [the Rabbi]2885-the rabbi used to recite at sunset . " [The Lord God]261-god is a Sun and Shield : [The Lord]7127-the lord will give Grace and Glory ; No good thing will [He]7127-the lord withhold from [them]7128-them that walk uprightly . [O Lord of [Hosts]82-hosts]7129-o lord of hosts , blessed is [the man that trusteth in [Thee]7129-o lord of hosts]7130-the man that trusteth in thee . "[2885-the rabbi]

[His]132-hugh eyes upon the shield , [his]132-hugh hands clasped around [his]132-hugh knee , [Hugh]132-hugh said , softly : " The face of [God]261-god , [[my]132-hugh beloved]4702-my beloved , or the nearest [I]132-hugh know to [His]261-god face : and behind [Him]261-god , [thy]261-god face "[132-hugh]

And then [his]132-hugh voice fell of a sudden silent ; [his]132-hugh heart beat in [his]132-hugh throat , [his]132-hugh fingers gripped [his]132-hugh knee ; for something moved softly in the shining surface , and there looked out at [him]132-hugh from [his]132-hugh own silver shield , the face of [the woman [he]132-hugh loved]876-the woman he loved .

How long [he]132-hugh kneeled and gazed without stirring , [Hugh]132-hugh could not tell . At that moment life paused suspended , and [he]132-hugh ceased to be conscious of time . But , at length , pressing nearer , [his]132-hugh own dark head appeared in the shield , and above [him]132-hugh , bending toward [him]132-hugh , [Mora]144-mora , shimmering in softest white , as on [her]144-mora wedding morn , [her]144-mora hands outstretched , [her]144-mora eyes full of a tender yearning , gazing into [his]132-hugh .

" The Vision for which [I]764-the knight prayed ! "[764-the knight] cried [the Knight]764-the knight . " O , [[my]764-the knight God]6394-my god ! Is this the sign of [Thy]6394-my god nearness ? Is this a promise that [[my]764-the knight wife]4532-my wife will come to [me]764-the knight ? "[764-the knight]

[He]132-hugh hid [his]132-hugh face in [his]132-hugh hands .

A gentle touch fell lightly on [his]132-hugh hair .

" Not a promise , [Hugh]132-hugh , "[764-the knight] came a tender whisper close behind [him]132-hugh . " A sign of [God]261-god 's nearness ; a proof of [mine]764-the knight . [Hugh]132-hugh , [[my]764-the knight own dear Knight]7134-my own dear knight , lift up [your]132-hugh head and look . [[Your]132-hugh wife]4531-your wife has come [home]305-home . "[764-the knight]

Leaping to [his]132-hugh feet , [he]132-hugh turned ; still dazzled , incredulous .

No shadowy reflection this . [[His]132-hugh wife]5587-his wife stood before [him]132-hugh , fair as on [her]5587-his wife wedding morning , a jewelled circlet clasping the golden glory of [her]5587-his wife hair . But [his]132-hugh eyes saw only the look in [hers]5587-his wife .

Yet [he]132-hugh kept [his]132-hugh distance .

" [Mora]144-mora ? "[132-hugh] [he]132-hugh whispered . " [Home]305-home ? To stay ? Hath a true vision then been granted [thee]5587-his wife ? "[132-hugh]

" Oh , [Hugh]132-hugh , "[5587-his wife] [she]5587-his wife answered , " [I]5587-his wife have seen deep into the heart of [a true man]3962-a true man . [I]5587-his wife have seen [myself]5587-his wife unworthy , in the light of [thy]5587-his wife great loyalty . [I]5587-his wife have seen all others fail , but [[my]5587-his wife Knight of [the Silver Shield]83-the silver shield]7139-my knight of the silver shield stand faithful . [I]5587-his wife have been shewn this by so strange a chance , that [I]5587-his wife humbly take it to be the Finger of [God]261-god pointing out the pathway of [His]261-god will . [My]5587-his wife pride is in the dust . [My]5587-his wife self - will lies slain . But [my]5587-his wife love for [thee]5587-his wife has become as great a thing as the heart of [a woman]813-a woman may know . [Thy]5587-his wife faithfulness shames [my]5587-his wife poor doubts of [thee]5587-his wife . The richness of [thy]5587-his wife giving , beggars [my]5587-his wife yearning to bestow . Yet now at last [[thy]5587-his wife wife]4342-thy wife can come to [thee]5587-his wife without a doubt , without a tremor , all hesitancy gone , all [she]4342-thy wife is , and all [she]4342-thy wife has , quite simply , thine . Oh , [Hugh]132-hugh , thine own to do with as [thou]5587-his wife wilt . All these years kept for [thee]5587-his wife . Take [me]5587-his wife Ah ! . . . Oh , [Hugh]132-hugh , [thy]5587-his wife strength ! Is this love , or is there some deeper , more rapturous word ? Oh , [dear man of [mine]1063-his mother]4522-dear man of mine , how strong must have been the flood - gates , if this was the pent - up force behind them ! "[5587-his wife]

[He]4112-he carried [her]4113-her to the hearth in [the great hall]1672-the great hall , and placed [her]4113-her in the chair in which [[his]4112-he mother]1063-his mother used to sit .

Then , [his]4112-he arms still around [her]4113-her , [he]4112-he kneeled before [her]4113-her , lifting [his]4112-he face in which the dark eyes glowed with a deeper light than passion 's transient fires .

" [The Madonna]435-the madonna ! "[4112-he] [he]4112-he said . " [The Madonna]146-the madonna in [[my]4112-he home]4615-my home . "[4112-he]

[He]4112-he stooped and lifted the hem of [her]4113-her robe to [his]4112-he lips .

" Not as [Prioress]91-mother sub - prioress , "[4112-he] [he]4112-he said , " but as [[my]4112-he adored wife]7145-my adored wife . "[4112-he]

Again [he]4112-he stooped and pressed it to [his]4112-he lips .

" Not as [Reverend Mother]93-the reverend mother to [a score of [nuns]2613-nuns]7146-a score of nuns , "[4112-he] [he]4112-he said , " but as "[4112-he]

[She]4113-her caught [his]4112-he head between [her]4113-her hands , hiding [his]4112-he glowing eyes against [her]4113-her breast .

Presently : " And did [[thy]7148-thy people]2119-thy people come with [thee]4113-her , [[my]4113-her sweetheart]7150-my sweetheart ? And how could a three hours ' ride be accomplished in this bridal array ? Oh , Heaven help [me]4113-her , [Mora]144-mora ! [Thou]7148-thy art so beautiful ! "[4113-her]

" Hush , "[4113-her] [she]4113-her said , " [thou]4112-he dear , [foolish man]7151-foolish man ! Heaven hath helped [thee]4112-he through worse straits than that ! Nay , [I]4113-her rode alone , and in [my]4113-her riding dress of green . Arrived here , [I]4113-her changed , in [[mine]4113-her own chamber]2514-mine own chamber , to these marriage garments . "[4113-her]

" In [thine own chamber]7153-thine own chamber ? "[4112-he] [He]4112-he looked at [her]4113-her , with bewildered eyes . " Here here , in [thine own chamber]7153-thine own chamber , [Mora]144-mora ? "[4112-he] [The mother]4606-the mother in [her]4606-the mother thrilled with tenderness , as [she]4113-her bent and looked into those bewildered eyes . For once , [she]4113-her felt older than [he]4112-he , and wiser . The sense of inexperience fell from [her]4113-her . For very joy [she]4113-her laughed as [she]4113-her made answer .

" Dear Heart , "[4113-her] [she]4113-her said , " [I]4113-her could scarce come [home]305-home unless [I]4113-her had [a chamber to which to come]7156-a chamber to which to come ! [Martin]133-martin shewed [me]4113-her which had been [[thy]4112-he mother]7157-thy mother 's , and daily in thine absence [he]133-martin and [I]4113-her rode over , and others with [us]7158-us , bringing all things needful , thus making it ready , against [thy]4112-he return . "[4113-her]

" Ready ? "[4112-he] [he]4112-he said . " Against [my]4112-he return ? "[4112-he]

[She]4113-her laid [her]4113-her lips upon [his]4112-he hair .

" [I]4113-her hope it will please [thee]4112-he , [[my]4113-her lord]4881-my lord , "[4113-her] [she]4113-her said . " Come and see . "[4113-her]

[She]4113-her made for to rise , but with masterful hands [he]4112-he held [her]4113-her down . [His]4112-he great strength must have some outlet , lest it should overmaster the gentleness of [his]4112-he love . Also , perhaps , the primitive instincts of [wild warrior forefathers]4117-wild warrior forefathers arose , of a sudden , within [him]4112-he .

" [I]4112-he must carry [thee]4113-her , "[4112-he] [he]4112-he said . " Not a step thither shalt [thou]4113-her walk . Thine own feet brought [thee]4113-her to [the crypt]273-the crypt ; [others]482-others bore [thee]4113-her thence . [[Thy]4113-her palfrey]7162-thy palfrey carried [thee]4113-her [home]305-home ; [[thy]4113-her palfrey]7162-thy palfrey bore [thee]4113-her here . But to [[our]7165-our chamber]7166-our chamber , [[my]4112-he wife]4532-my wife , [I]4112-he carry [thee]4113-her , alone . "[4112-he]

[She]4118-her would sooner have gone on [her]4118-her own feet ; but [her]4118-her joy this day , was to give [him]4119-he all [he]4119-he wished , and as [he]4119-he wished it .

As [he]4119-he bent above [her]4118-her , [she]4118-her slipped [her]4118-her arms around [his]4119-he neck . " Then carry [me]4118-her , [dear Heart]6512-dear heart , "[4118-her] [she]4118-her said , " but do not let [me]4118-her fall . "[4118-her]

[He]4119-he laughed ; and as [he]4119-he swung [her]4118-her out of the seat , and strode across [the great hall]1672-the great hall to where the western glow still gleamed from the doorway of [[[his]4119-he mother]1063-his mother 's chamber]4122-his mother 's chamber , [she]4118-her knew of a sudden , why [he]4119-he had wished to carry [her]4118-her . [His]4119-he great strength gave [him]4119-he such easy mastery ; helped [her]4118-her to feel so wholly [his]4119-he .

On the threshold of [the chamber]627-the chamber [he]4119-he paused .

Bending [his]4119-he face to [hers]4118-her , [he]4119-he touched [her]4118-her lips with exceeding gentleness . Then spoke in [her]4118-her ear , deep and low . " Say again what [thou]7169-thou didst say ten nights ago when [we]7170-we parted in the dawning , on the battlements . "[4119-he]

" [I]4118-her love [thee]4119-he , "[4118-her] [she]4118-her whispered , and closed [her]4118-her eyes .

Then [Hugh]132-hugh passed within .

CHAPTER LX

[THE CONVENT BELL]4124-the convent bell

The slanting rays of the setting sun lay , in golden bands , upon the flags of [the Convent cloister]263-the convent cloister .

Complete silence reigned .

[The White Ladies]288-the white ladies had returned from Vespers . Each , in the solitude of [[her]4118-her own cell]287-her own cell , was spending , in prayer and meditation , the hour until the Refectory bell should ring .

The great door into [the cloisters]316-the cloisters stood wide .

[Mother Sub - Prioress]324-mother sub - prioress appeared in the far distance , moving down [the passage]497-the passage . As [she]324-mother sub - prioress passed between the long line of closed doors , [she]324-mother sub - prioress turned [her]324-mother sub - prioress face quickly from side to side , pausing occasionally to listen , ear laid against the panelling .

Presently [she]324-mother sub - prioress stepped from the cool shadow into the sunny brightness of [the cloister]286-the cloister .

[She]324-mother sub - prioress did not blink , as [old Mary Antony]85-mary antony used to blink . [Her]324-mother sub - prioress small eyes peered from out [her]324-mother sub - prioress veil as sharply in sunshine as in shadow .

Yet was there something curiously furtive about [Mother Sub - Prioress]91-mother sub - prioress , when [she]324-mother sub - prioress entered [the cloister]286-the cloister . Listening at the doors in [the cell passage]265-the cell passage , [she]324-mother sub - prioress had been merely official , acting with a precise celerity which bespoke long practice . Now [she]324-mother sub - prioress hesitated ; looked around as if to make sure [she]324-mother sub - prioress was not observed , and obviously held , with [her]324-mother sub - prioress left hand , something concealed .

Moving along [the cloister]286-the cloister , [she]324-mother sub - prioress seated [herself]324-mother sub - prioress upon the stone slab in the archway overlooking [the lawn]2475-the lawn and [the pieman]547-the pieman 's tree ; then drew forth from beneath [her]324-mother sub - prioress scapulary , the worn leathern wallet which had belonged to [the old lay - sister]264-the old lay - sister , [Mary Antony]85-mary antony .

At the same moment there came a gentle flick of wings , and [the robin]339-the robin alighted on the stone coping , not three feet from the elbow of [Mother Sub - Prioress]91-mother sub - prioress .

Very bright - eyed , and tall on [his]4139-his legs , was [[Mary Antony]85-mary antony 's little vain man]4140-mary antony 's little vain man . With [his]4139-his head on one side , [he]4139-his looked inquiringly at [Mother Sub - Prioress]91-mother sub - prioress ; and [Mother Sub - Prioress]91-mother sub - prioress , from out the curtain of [her]91-mother sub - prioress veil , frowned back at [him]4139-his .

There was a solemn quality in the complete silence . No naughty tales of [[bakers]4141-bakers ' boys]4142-bakers ' boys or [piemen]4143-piemen . No gay chirps of expectation . Receiving cheese from [Mother Sub - Prioress]91-mother sub - prioress , bestowed for conscience ' sake , partook of the nature of a sacred ceremony . Yet the robin had come for [his]4139-his cheese , and [the Sub - Prioress]91-mother sub - prioress had come to give it to [him]4139-his .

Presently [she]91-mother sub - prioress slowly opened the wallet , took therefrom some choice morsels , and strewed them on the coping .

" Here , bird , "[91-mother sub - prioress] [she]91-mother sub - prioress said , grimly ; " [I]91-mother sub - prioress can not let [thee]4139-his miss [thy]4139-his cheese because [the foolish old creature who taught [thee]4139-his to look for it]7171-the foolish old creature who taught thee to look for it , comes this way no more . Take it and begone ! "[91-mother sub - prioress]

This was the daily formula .

[The " jaunty little layman , "[4144-the " jaunty little layman , " undismayed though the look was austere] undismayed though the look was austere]4144-the " jaunty little layman , " undismayed though the look was austere , and the voice , forbidding hopped gaily nearer , pecking eagerly . No gaping mouths now waited [his]4139-his return . [His]4139-his nestlings were grown and flown . At last [he]4139-his could afford to feast [himself]4139-his .

[Mother Sub - Prioress]91-mother sub - prioress turned [her]91-mother sub - prioress back upon the coping and stared at the archway opposite . [She]91-mother sub - prioress had no wish to see the bird 's enjoyment .

Then a strange thing happened .

Having pecked up all [he]4139-his wanted , [the robin]339-the robin turned [his]4139-his bright eye upon the motionless figure , seated so near [him]4139-his , wrapped in the aloofness of an impenetrable silence .

Excepting in [her]91-mother sub - prioress dying moments , [Mary Antony]85-mary antony 's much loved little bird had never adventured nearer to [her]91-mother sub - prioress than to hop along the coping , pecking at [her]91-mother sub - prioress fingers when , to test [his]4139-his boldness , [she]91-mother sub - prioress reached out and with them covered the cheese .

Yet now , with a gentle flick of wings , lo , [he]4139-his alighted on the knee of [Mother Sub - Prioress]91-mother sub - prioress ! Then , while [she]91-mother sub - prioress scarce dared breathe , for wonder and amaze , hopped to [her]91-mother sub - prioress arm and pecked gently at [her]91-mother sub - prioress veil .

[Whereupon]144-mora something broke in the cold heart of [Mother Sub - Prioress]91-mother sub - prioress . Tears ran slowly down the thin face . [She]91-mother sub - prioress would not stir nor lift [her]91-mother sub - prioress hand to wipe them away , and they fell in heavy drops upon [her]91-mother sub - prioress folded fingers .

At length [she]91-mother sub - prioress spoke , in a broken whisper .

" Oh , [thou]7172-thou little winged thing , "[91-mother sub - prioress] [she]91-mother sub - prioress said , " who so easily could'st fly from [me]91-mother sub - prioress ! Dost [thou]7172-thou use those wings of liberty to draw yet nearer ? In this place of high walls and [narrow cells]7173-narrow cells , [they]7174-they who have not full freedom , use to the full what freedom [they]7174-they possess , to turn , at [my]91-mother sub - prioress approach and fly from [me]91-mother sub - prioress . Not one if [she]7175-she could choose , would choose to come to [me]91-mother sub - prioress . . . . Is there any honour so great as that of being feared by [all]410-all ? Is there any loneliness so great as by all to be hated ? That honour , [little bird]7177-little bird , is [mine]91-mother sub - prioress ; also that loneliness . Who then hath sent [thee]7172-thou thus to essay to take both from [me]91-mother sub - prioress ? "[91-mother sub - prioress]

Heavy tears continued to fall upon the clasped hands ; the worn face was distorted by mental suffering . The frozen soul of [Mother Sub - Prioress]91-mother sub - prioress having melted , the iron of self - knowledge was entering into it , causing the dull ache of a pain unspeakable . Yet [she]91-mother sub - prioress dared not sob , lest the heaving of [her]91-mother sub - prioress bosom should frighten away the little bird perched so lightly on [her]91-mother sub - prioress arm .

This evidence of the trust in [her]91-mother sub - prioress of a little living thing , was the one rope to which [Mother Sub - Prioress]324-mother sub - prioress clung in those first moments , during which the black waters of remorse and despair passed over [her]91-mother sub - prioress head a rope made of frail enough strands , God knows : bright eyes alert , small clinging feet , a pair of folded wings . Yet do the frailest threads of love and trust , make a safer rope to which to cling when shipwreck threatens the heart , than the iron chains of obligation and duty .

Presently a sordid doubt seized upon [Mother Sub - Prioress]91-mother sub - prioress . Had [the robin]339-the robin finished the cheese , and come to [her]91-mother sub - prioress thus , merely to ask for more ?

Very slowly [she]91-mother sub - prioress ventured to turn [her]91-mother sub - prioress head , until the stone coping at [her]91-mother sub - prioress elbow came into [her]91-mother sub - prioress range of vision .

Then a glow of pride and happiness warmed [her]91-mother sub - prioress heart . Three four five fragments remained ! Not for greed or favour had this little wild thing of [his]339-the robin own free will drawn near .

For what , then ? . . .

[Mother Sub - Prioress]91-mother sub - prioress whispered the answer ; and as [she]91-mother sub - prioress whispered it , [her]91-mother sub - prioress tears fell afresh ; but now they were tears without bitterness ; a healing fount seemed to well up within [her]91-mother sub - prioress softening heart .

For love ? Yea , verily ! For love of [her]91-mother sub - prioress , those small brown wings had brought [him]339-the robin near , those bright eyes were unafraid .

" For love of [me]91-mother sub - prioress , "[91-mother sub - prioress] [she]91-mother sub - prioress whispered . " For love of [me]91-mother sub - prioress . "[91-mother sub - prioress]

When at length [he]339-the robin chirped and flew , [she]91-mother sub - prioress still sat motionless , listening as [he]339-the robin sang [his]339-the robin evening song high up in [the pieman]547-the pieman 's tree .

Then [she]91-mother sub - prioress rose and swept the untouched fragments back into the wallet . There was triumph in the action . " For love ! "[91-mother sub - prioress] [she]91-mother sub - prioress said . " Not of that which [I]91-mother sub - prioress brought and gave , but of that which [he]4673-the bishop thought [me]91-mother sub - prioress to be . "[91-mother sub - prioress]

Slowly [she]91-mother sub - prioress left [the cloister]286-the cloister , moving , with bent head , until [she]91-mother sub - prioress reached the open door of [the empty chamber which had been [the Reverend Mother]93-the reverend mother 's]4150-the empty chamber which had been the reverend mother 's .

Before long [this chamber]3210-this chamber would be [hers]91-mother sub - prioress . At noon [she]91-mother sub - prioress had received word from [the Bishop]4673-the bishop that it was [his]4673-the bishop intention to appoint [her]91-mother sub - prioress to be [Prioress]91-mother sub - prioress , for the years which yet remained of [the Reverend Mother]93-the reverend mother 's term of office .

[She]91-mother sub - prioress had experienced a sinister pleasure in being thus promoted to this high office by [the Bishop]4673-the bishop , owing to the certainty that had the usual election by ballot taken place , [her]91-mother sub - prioress name would not have been inscribed by [a single member of [the Community]483-the community]4154-a single member of the community .

Yet now , in this strangely softened mood , [she]91-mother sub - prioress began wistfully to desire that there might be looks of pleasure and satisfaction on at least a few faces , when the announcement should be made on the morrow .

[Mother Sub - Prioress]91-mother sub - prioress passed into [the cell]291-the cell , and closed the door .

[She]91-mother sub - prioress was drawn , by the glow of the sunset , to the oriel window . But on [her]91-mother sub - prioress way thither [she]91-mother sub - prioress found [herself]91-mother sub - prioress unexpectedly arrested before [the marble group of [the Virgin and Child]616-the virgin and child]4157-the marble group of the virgin and child .

[Mother Sub - Prioress]91-mother sub - prioress never could see [a naked babe]4159-a naked babe without experiencing a feeling of irritation against [those who had failed to provide it with suitable clothing]4160-those who had failed to provide it with suitable clothing . Possibly this was why [she]91-mother sub - prioress had hurriedly looked the other way if [her]91-mother sub - prioress eye chanced to fall upon the beautiful sculpture in [the [Prioress]91-mother sub - prioress 's cell]1809-the prioress 's cell .

Now , for the first time , [she]91-mother sub - prioress really saw it .

[She]91-mother sub - prioress stood and gazed ; then knelt , and tried to understand .

The tenderness reached [her]91-mother sub - prioress heart and shook it . The encircling arms , the loving breast , [the watchful mother]4162-the watchful mother - eyes ; the exquisite human love , called forth by the necessity , the dependence , the helplessness of [a little child]4768-a little child .

And were there not [souls equally helpless]4164-souls equally helpless , and hearts just as dependent upon sympathy and tenderness ?

[The Prioress]91-mother sub - prioress had understood this , and had ruled by love .

But [Mother Sub - Prioress]91-mother sub - prioress had ever preferred the briers and the burning .

[She]91-mother sub - prioress recalled a conversation [she]91-mother sub - prioress had had a day or two before with [the Prior]2987-the prior and [the Chaplain]1334-the chaplain , when [they]4167-they came to consult with [her]91-mother sub - prioress concerning the future of [the Community]483-the community , and [her]91-mother sub - prioress possible appointment . In speaking of [the late Prioress]4169-the late prioress , [the Prior]2987-the prior had said : " [She]4169-the late prioress ever seemed as [one apart , who walked among the stars ; yet full , to overflowing , of the milk of human kindness and the gracious balm of sympathy]7178-one apart , who walked among the stars ; yet full , to overflowing , of the milk of human kindness and the gracious balm of sympathy . "[2987-the prior] [He]2987-the prior had then asked [Mother Sub - Prioress]91-mother sub - prioress if [she]91-mother sub - prioress felt able to follow in [her]91-mother sub - prioress steps . To which [Mother Sub - Prioress]91-mother sub - prioress , vexed at the question , had answered , tartly : Nay ; that [she]91-mother sub - prioress knew no Milky Way ! [Whereupon Father Benedict]180-father benedict , a sudden gleam of approval on [his]2987-the prior sinister face , had interposed , addressing [the Prior]2987-the prior : " Nay , verily ! [[Our]7179-our excellent Sub - Prioress]4375-our excellent sub - prioress knows no [Milky Way]84-milky way ! [She]4375-our excellent sub - prioress is the brier , which hath sharply taught the tender flesh of each . [She]4375-our excellent sub - prioress is the bed of nettles from which the most weary moves on to rest elsewhere . [She]4375-our excellent sub - prioress is the fearsome burning , from which [the frightened brands]7181-the frightened brands do snatch [themselves]7181-the frightened brands ! "[2987-the prior]

These words , spoken in approbation , had been meant to please ; and at first [she]91-mother sub - prioress had been flattered . Then the look upon the kind face of [the Prior]2987-the prior , had given [her]91-mother sub - prioress the sense of being shut up with [Father Benedict]180-father benedict in a fearsome Purgatory of [their]4173-their own making nay rather , in a hell , where pity , mercy , and loving - kindness were unknown .

Perhaps this was the hour when the change of mind in [Mother Sub - Prioress]91-mother sub - prioress really had its beginning , for [Father Benedict]180-father benedict 's terrible yet true description of [her]91-mother sub - prioress methods and [her]91-mother sub - prioress rule , now came forcefully back to [her]91-mother sub - prioress .

Putting out a trembling hand , [she]91-mother sub - prioress touched the little foot of [the Babe]438-the babe .

" Give [me]91-mother sub - prioress tenderness , "[91-mother sub - prioress] [she]91-mother sub - prioress said , and an agony of supplication was in [her]91-mother sub - prioress voice ; also a rain of tears softened the hard lines of [her]91-mother sub - prioress face .

[[Our]4175-our blessed Lady]4297-our blessed lady smiled , and [the sweet Babe]1903-the sweet babe looked merry .

[Mother Sub - Prioress]91-mother sub - prioress passed to the window . The sun , round and blood red , as at that very moment reflected in [Hugh d'Argent]132-hugh 's shield , was just about to dip below the horizon . When next it rose , the day would have dawned which would see [[her]91-mother sub - prioress Prioress of [the White Ladies of [Worcester]1-worcester]283-the white ladies of worcester]4178-her prioress of the white ladies of worcester .

[She]91-mother sub - prioress turned to [the place where [the Prioress]373-the prioress 's chair of state]4180-the place where the prioress 's chair of state stood empty . During the walk to and from [the Cathedral]279-the cathedral , [she]91-mother sub - prioress had planned to come alone to [this chamber]3210-this chamber , and seat [herself]91-mother sub - prioress in the chair which would so soon be [hers]91-mother sub - prioress . But now a new humbleness restrained [her]91-mother sub - prioress .

Falling upon [her]91-mother sub - prioress knees before the empty chair , [she]91-mother sub - prioress lifted clasped hands heavenward .

" O [God]261-god , "[91-mother sub - prioress] [she]91-mother sub - prioress said , " [I]91-mother sub - prioress am not worthy to take [Her]373-the prioress place . [My]91-mother sub - prioress heart is hard and cold ; [my]91-mother sub - prioress tongue is ofttimes cruel ; [my]91-mother sub - prioress spirit is censorious . But [I]91-mother sub - prioress have learned a lesson from the bird and a lesson from [the Babe]147-the holy babe ; and that which [I]91-mother sub - prioress know not teach [Thou]7182-thou [me]91-mother sub - prioress . Create in [me]91-mother sub - prioress a new heart , [O God]261-god , and renew a right spirit within [me]91-mother sub - prioress . Grant unto [me]91-mother sub - prioress to follow in [Her]91-mother sub - prioress gracious steps , and to rule , as [She]91-mother sub - prioress ruled , by that love which never faileth . "[91-mother sub - prioress]

Then , stooping to the ground , [she]91-mother sub - prioress kissed the place where the feet of [the Prioress]373-the prioress had been wo nt to rest .

The sun had set behind [the distant hills]5396-the distant hills , when [Mother Sub - Prioress]91-mother sub - prioress rose from [her]91-mother sub - prioress knees .

An unspeakable peace filled [her]91-mother sub - prioress soul . [She]91-mother sub - prioress had prayed , by name , for [each member of [the Community]483-the community]4186-each member of the community ; and as [she]91-mother sub - prioress prayed , a gift of love for [each]415-each had been granted to [her]91-mother sub - prioress .

Ah , would [they]4189-they make discovery , before the morrow , that instead of the brier had come up the myrtle tree ?

With this hope filling [her]91-mother sub - prioress heart , [Mother Sub - Prioress]324-mother sub - prioress hastened along [the passage]497-the passage , and rang the Convent bell .

And at that moment , [Mora]144-mora stood within [[her]144-mora chamber]4322-her chamber , looking over [terrace]4193-terrace , [valley]4194-valley , and [forest]4195-forest to where the sun had vanished below the horizon , leaving behind a deep orange glow , paling above to clear blue where , like a lamp just lit , hung luminous the evening star .

[Hugh]132-hugh 's arms were still wrapped about [her]144-mora . As [they]4196-they stood together at the casement , [she]144-mora leaned upon [his]132-hugh heart . [His]132-hugh strength enveloped [her]144-mora . [His]132-hugh love infused a wondrous sense of well - being , and of [home]305-home .

Yet of a sudden [she]144-mora lifted [her]144-mora head , as if to listen .

" What is it , "[132-hugh] questioned [Hugh]132-hugh , [his]132-hugh lips against [her]144-mora hair .

" Hush ! "[144-mora] [she]144-mora whispered . " [I]144-mora seem to hear the Convent bell . "[144-mora]

[His]132-hugh arms tightened [their]4198-their hold of [her]144-mora .

" Nay , [[my]132-hugh beloved]4702-my beloved , "[132-hugh] [he]132-hugh said . " There is no place for echoes of [the Cloister]286-the cloister , in the harmony of [home]305-home . "[132-hugh] [She]144-mora turned and looked at [him]132-hugh .

[Her]144-mora eyes were soft with love , yet luminous with an inward light , that moment kindled .

" Dear Heart , "[144-mora] [she]144-mora said hastening to reassure [him]132-hugh , for an anxious question was in [his]132-hugh look " [I]144-mora have come [home]305-home to [thee]132-hugh with a completeness of glad giving and surrender , such as [I]144-mora did not dream could be , and scarce yet understand . But [Hugh]132-hugh , [[my]144-mora husband]6683-my husband , to [one who has known the calm and peace of the Cloister]7188-one who has known the calm and peace of the cloister there will always be [an inner sanctuary in which will sound the call to prayer and vigil]7189-an inner sanctuary in which will sound the call to prayer and vigil . [I]144-mora am not less thine own nay , rather [I]144-mora shall ever be free to be more wholly thine because , as [we]7190-we first stood together in [[our]7190-we chamber]7166-our chamber , [I]144-mora heard the Convent bell . "[144-mora]

One look [she]144-mora gave , to make sure [he]132-hugh understood ; then swiftly hid [her]144-mora face against [his]132-hugh breast .

[Hugh]132-hugh spoke [his]132-hugh answer very low , [his]132-hugh lips close to [her]144-mora ear .

But [his]132-hugh eyes with that light in them , which [her]144-mora happy heart scarce yet dared see again were lifted to the evening star .
